page.title: 07SUPERNATURAL/RECREATION
page.content:
unexpectedly died.She now haunts their house in {Scatness. }
There are quite a lot of leisure and recreation and activities in our area for its size and population.Clubs are: {The Boating Club },situated at {East {Shore}which is on {The Pool Of Virkie. It is members only or if you are with a member.Windsurfing,Sailing and also Canoeing.They have dances,jumble_sales and other fund raising events.At the { {Maybury Club}they have dances,show films ,etc.At the {Sumburgh Social {Club}they have dances and guest singers from the mainland of Britain.The most recent important event was the {'Hamefarin'.}People came home from all over the world.Exhibitions of old farm implements,dances and {Sea Rescue } boat displays were organised.
